testcase.name: Bag create with 100 quantity
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Bag create with 100 quantity Given a set of specific parts ... skipped in 0.000s | name | description | quantity | | partA | descriptionA | 10 | | partB | descriptionB | 0 | | partC | descriptionC | 0 | Given a bag type "bagtype1" with parts list of ... skipped in 0.000s | name | part | quantity | | A | partA | 1 | | B | partB | 2 | | C | partC | 3 | Given a set of specific bags ... skipped in 0.000s | name | kind | quantity | complete | | A | bagtype1 | 1 | | | B | bagtype1 | 2 | | | C | bagtype1 | 3 | | When I create "100" "bag" of "bagtype1" "bagtype" ... skipped in 0.000s Then I should see the "quantity" is number "100" ... skipped in 0.000s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Bags read
testcase.system-out:

@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
